translations: n.芯块，小球（pellet 的复数）；靶丸
v.使形成小球（pellet 的第三人称单数）

phrs.translation: 制粒设备；制片机；制丸磨；饲料压粒机

sentences.sentence: The material will be processed into plastic pellets.
sentences.translation: 该原料将被加工成塑料颗粒。

sentences.sentence: The fries are made from pellets of pulverized potatoes.
sentences.translation: 这些薯条是用捣碎后的土豆颗粒做成的。

sentences.sentence: When five pellets are placed on top without falling off, catching cicadas is as easy as picking a ball up from the ground.
sentences.translation: 如果把五个弹丸放在上面而不掉下来，捕蝉就像从地上捡球一样容易了。
